name: Neko Yume 猫夢
description:
Neko Yume was made for the Emulated Dreams Game Jam.

Neko Yume is heavily inspired by games like LSD Dream Emulator and Yume Nikki. Explore a cat-filled dream looking for four lost cats.  You don't have to though. You can just walk around and look at the weird, partially randomized world if you would like.

Neko Yume has a day/night cycle as well as randomized events. Different can things happen depending on whether it is day or night. Even if you have explored an area once, there is no guarantee that it will be the same when you return.

~~~~~~Happy Dreaming~~~~~~

ControlsMoveWASDLookArrow KeysRunShift
